codeHint.entryTypeTooltip: Defines whether this entry has been generated for a structural (S) or behavioral (B) test case.
codeHint.removeEntryQuestion: Are you sure you want to remove this entry?
codeHint.noEntries: This code hint has no solution fragments.
codeHint.deleted: Deleted Code Hint with identifier {{ param }}

nextButton.label: Next
nextButton.tooltip: The current step has to be performed to proceed.

step1.name: Git-Diff Report
step1.description: The git-diff report is created automatically for the template and solution repositories for every submission to either of the repositories.
step1.notGenerated: The Git-Diff report has not been generated yet.

step2.name: Coverage Report
step2.description: The coverage report is created automatically for every submission to the solution repository.
step2.notGenerated: The coverage report has not been generated yet.

step3.name: Solution fragments
step3.description: This steps allows to edit the individual solution fragments from which code hints are generated.
step3.notGenerated: No solution fragments have been generated yet.

createManualFragmentButton.label: Create manual fragment
createManualFragmentButton.tooltip: Allows to create a manual solution fragment for a file and test case.

structuralEntriesButton.label: Generate structural fragments
structuralEntriesButton.tooltip: Generates fragments for structural test cases. Already existing structural fragments will be overwritten.

behavioralEntriesButton.label: Generate behavioral fragments
behavioralEntriesButton.tooltip: Generates fragments for behavioral test cases. Already existing behavioral fragments will be overwritten.

deleteAllEntriesButton.label: Delete all fragments
deleteAllEntriesButton.tooltip: Deletes all solution fragments for this exercise.
deleteAllEntriesButton.question: Are you sure to delete all solution fragments for this exercise?
deleteAllEntriesButton.title: Delete all solution fragments

deleteIndividualEntryButton.question: Are you sure to delete the solution fragment with ID {{ title }}?

step4.name: Code Hints
step4.description: This step allows to generate the code hints.
step4.title: Title
step4.notGenerated: No code hints have been generated yet.

updateHintsButton.label: Update code hints
updateHintsButton.tooltip: Create new code hints by re-assigning the existing solution fragments. The title, description, and content of the existing hint retain.
updateHintsButton.success: Code hints have been updated successfully

createHintsButton.label: Create code hints
createHintsButton.tooltip: Creates code hints from the existing solution fragments.
createHintsButton.success: Code hints have been created successfully

recreateHintsButton.label: Recreate code hints
recreateHintsButton.tooltip: Recreate code hints from the existing solution fragments. Existing hints will be overwritten.
recreateHintsButton.success: Code hints have been recreated successfully

programmingExerciseSolutionEntry.created: Created solution fragment with ID {{ param }}
programmingExerciseSolutionEntry.updated: Updated solution fragment with ID {{ param }}
programmingExerciseSolutionEntry.deleted: Deleted solution fragment with ID {{ param }}
programmingExerciseSolutionEntry.changeContentNote: Note: Changes apply to the fragments in existing code hints that contain this fragment.
